name: Amara (DanielTsc)
description:
Follow Amara on her journey to find a cure for her son.

What should you expect on this game:

  • Fast turn based combats;
  • No exhaustive random battles and grinding;
  • Charismatic characters;
  • A simple but heartwarming plot.

Current status:

This is short demo made with RPG Maker MZ. The game uses mostly the engine's RTP assets. 

If you play and have some feedback, please don't hesitate to send them to me on danielsousat@gmail.com or on the comments below.

How to play:

  • Arrow keys: movement;
  • A: Ok on menus and for the game's interactions;
  • B: Cancel;
  • X: Open menu;
  • Hold Shift: dash
